name: folio.js
author: DyslexicChris <npm@dyslexicchris.co.uk> (https://github.com/DyslexicChris)
description: A fluent Node.js HTTP API framework inspired by express

scripts.test: npm run unit-tests && npm run integration-tests
scripts.coveralls: ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- ./test/unit -R dot --recursive && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info && rm -rf ./coverage
